text: Anything stick out to anyone in this GA documentation job? <https://github.com/JuliaWeb/HTTP.jl/runs/1497185821>. Trying to figure out why the HTTP.jl docs haven't deployed the last couple of releases

elements.text: Anything stick out to anyone in this GA documentation job?
. Trying to figure out why the HTTP.jl docs haven't deployed the last couple of releases

text: You need to set TagBot up to use ssh token instead of GitHub secret. The latter doesn’t allow actions to trigger other actions (ie if TagBot does a release, your CI won’t run on that release)

elements.text: You need to set TagBot up to use ssh token instead of GitHub secret. The latter doesn’t allow actions to trigger other actions (ie if TagBot does a release, your CI won’t run on that release)

text: <https://github.com/JuliaHCI/ADI.jl/blob/master/.github/workflows/TagBot.yml|https://github.com/JuliaHCI/ADI.jl/blob/master/.github/workflows/TagBot.yml> something like this should work if you set up a documenter ssh secret already

elements.text: something like this should work if you set up a documenter ssh secret already

text: Ah, that's got to be it; thanks!

elements.text: Ah, that's got to be it; thanks!
